example.name: just transitive
example.text: But he said they are ``to a large degree, housekeeping,'' although some may generate some disagreement.

example.name: with source/material
example.text: For the last year, Santa Fe Pacific has redirected its real estate operations toward longer-term development of its properties, hurting profits that-1 the parent had generated *trace*-1 in the past from periodic sales from its portfolio.
example.arg: from periodic sales from its portfolio
